comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walter_Evans_Edge "Walter Evans Edge (November 20, 1873 – October 29, 1956) was an American politician. A Republican, he was twice the Governor of New Jersey, from 1917 to 1919 and again from 1944 to 1947, serving as governor during both World War I and World War II. Edge also served as United States Senator representing New Jersey from 1919 to 1929 and as United States Ambassador to France from 1929 to 1933."

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Swanq, thanks for giving us his full name and background. We will update our catalog record.
